content.p: We’re proud of all our students and we’d love to stay in touch with everyone after they graduate. Want to stay up to date on all the latest happenings at the School of Health Sciences? Whenever we’ve got news to share, either from current students and professors to our alumni, we’re always happy to share it on social media. So, if you want a glimpse into what we’re getting up to after you’ve left, make sure to follow us! As an alumni of the School of Health Sciences and the University of Nottingham, you can help current and future students with events, work placements, internships, career mentoring and more. You can also keep up to date with the latest School news with our news archive. This is where we’ll share the biggest news stories from the school. Got some great stories about what you’ve been getting up to? Keep in touch and let us know. We’re always interested to hear from our alumni, and we’d love to celebrate your successes with you and the world. Contact the Alumni Team B236, Medical School Queen's Medical Centre Nottingham, NG7 2HA telephone: +44 (0)115 95 15559 email: mhssupport@nottingham.ac.uk
